item.title: Portal 2 Delayed...again
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
DiePoente:

Hope never dies. Most of us can wait, since this mod isn’t the only thing in our/their lives, of members, in this forum. And when did they say “Don’t believe everything you hear”. If it was lately, then you should be able to show the posts. Im here for a long time now, I didn’t see any of these. Well, there is a possibility that I missed it, but I would like to see a evidence.

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=311513&postcount=285

Just one example. I can’t be arsed to use the search tool for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 Delayed...again
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
kewl:

Well, by experience I mean the fact that it took them all the way till 2009, and ended up delaying it. Now, at the end of 2010, it’s still not going to be released. Back in 2009, right after the delay, you guys were laughing at us for saying that it probably wouldn’t be released in 2010 either. But looks like we were right.

They also said, that 2009 was the year with the most interrupts, cause of school, family, some devs left the team because they have a life, and so on. Also, the year is still not over, moreover, they didn’t say a release date 2010, after the delay, so there is no statement of a release in this year.

kewl:

What gives you hope that it will be released next year? Also, lately the devs have been giving responses along the lines of: “Dont believe everything you hear.” and “Shit happens.” It seems like a way of the devs telling us that there is alot more work that needs to be done and we shouldn’t constantly be waiting for the mod to come out.

Hope never dies. Most of us can wait, since this mod isn’t the only thing in our/their lives, of members, in this forum.

The devs never say something to the state of the mod for 100%. They always show old stuff or old information. There is a reason why they just don’t tell us that “this needs to be done, and this, and then this, then we are finished”. It’s because of their experience how we reacted and handled with such given information. People always find a way to use such information against them. Im pretty sure, that the devs know what they do. The devs have a huge pressure, since this is a remake of one of the best FPS in the 90’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 Delayed...again
item.dc:creator: kewl
item.description:
blackout:

when have they implied it? and what is this ‘experience’ of yours?

Well, by experience I mean the fact that it took them all the way till 2009, and ended up delaying it. Now, at the end of 2010, it’s still not going to be released. Back in 2009, right after the delay, you guys were laughing at us for saying that it probably wouldn’t be released in 2010 either. But looks like we were right.

What gives you hope that it will be released next year? Also, lately the devs have been giving responses along the lines of: “Dont believe everything you hear.” and “Shit happens.” It seems like a way of the devs telling us that there is alot more work that needs to be done and we shouldn’t constantly be waiting for the mod to come out.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 Delayed...again
item.dc:creator: blackout
item.description:
kewl:

the devs said it themselves!

EDIT: well… they kind of implied it. I just don’t think they’re capable of releasing before 2012, that’s all. They can go ahead and prove me wrong by releasing within the next year, if they want. But my from my experience I think they probably won’t.

when have they implied it? and what is this ‘experience’ of yours?

screw it, it’ll be out before the three other games I need in 2011:

Shogun 2: Total War

AC: Brotherhood (PC)

Portal 2

and, in the ridiculously long run-

HL2:EP3

CoD MW3

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 Delayed...again
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Redtarget:

At the Moment i have two sides to my personality screaming for a post so here it goes:

The Interlectual side: I Hope this delay means extra sexy polish (Which valve are imense at).

The Retarded Side: Which will be Released first? Black mesa or Portal 2?!!?!?

Im sorry for the second part, but it just came through my head…

… Ignore as needed.

Redtarget:

Interlectual[/SIZE]

Redtarget:

Interlectual[/SIZE]

Redtarget:

Interlectual[/SIZE]
